q: Clearly, this was not the case in this situation and one without my knowledge or approval,'' he said. In his own statement, Dwaine Caraway said the key was`` ceremonial.'' These ceremonial gifts are different from the official keys to the city presented by the mayor, he said. The rules, as written, will not improve safety, and regulations that are based neither on science nor operational experience should be rejected. U.S. Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand , D-N.Y., also had spoken out Friday about potential delays in the implementation of safety improvements made after the crash, saying debates about possible funding cuts shouldn't alter the timetable.
